title: S2 Ep37: #87 - Exposing Our Past Employers
itunes:title: #87 - Exposing Our Past Employers
description:

GO DEMARCUS! GO DEMARCUS! The most relatable content creator is here this week…DeMarcus Shawn. As a teacher, janitor, salesman, penguin, and security guard…we’re surprised he was able to make time for us. DeMarcus exposes his past employers and shares his most ridiculous customer service stories. So, butter your popcorn, quit your job, and enjoy the show!
itunes:author: Zane & Heath
